name: Rossignol Race Classic Bindings - Unisex
description: Kick and glide with confidence. The Race Classic IFP binding is made for performance and equipped with an automatic step-in function and double lock slider. A low profile stack height gives you more on-snow feel.Flex index is designed for classic skiing to promote power transfer and ski control (5.0 flex index; 45° amplitude).Step-in design automatically clicks closed. Twist the ergonomic turn lock to open.Low profile stack height ensures maximum stability through the gliding phase and direct snow feel for increased precision.Bindings can be moved forward on the ski for more grip and easier climbing or backward for better glide.Compatible with IFP mounting plate only.
